set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: TSN Energy signatures detected.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: TSN Weapon signatures detected.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: TSN Warp signatures detected.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Readings indicate long range transit via possible slingshot array

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Emissions correlate with Kralien energy signatures.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Pattern of field indicates a Kralien power source. Possible Kralien weapon signature.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.desc: Bio-electric phases pulses. Oscillating field variance of 2.9ghz
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Indications of recent data transmission burst, most likely Kralien in origin.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Composition of residual bio-neural energy suggests Kralien origins.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Distortion wave indicates Torgoth energy signature

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Correlates with Torgoth weapon signature profiles

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Analysis of fragment compounds suggests Torgoth origins

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.desc: High frequency EM carrier wave pulses. Variance of 3.4 indicating encryption of waveforms
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Signal patterns consistent with Torgoth communications protocols

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Field patterns indicates possible Arvonian energy signatures

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Waveform and dispurtion suggests Arvonian weapons signatures.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Pirate Energy signatures detected.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Pirate Weapon signatures detected.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Pirate Warp signatures detected.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: High frequency distortion patterns within field indicate a jump event. Dispurtion correlates with Skaraan jump drive technologies.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Resonance of particles consistent with energy weapon discharge. Frequence matches Skaraan weapons technology

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Field density and variance consistent with Skaraan warp drive signatures

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: High frequency disruption patterns indicate possible Skaraan cloacking technologies.

set_ship_text.name: (|ScanPointNumber|)
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Resonance frequency and particle density consistent with Skaraan high energy data transmissions.

event.name: Initiate Ship1 Boarding
event.incoming_comms_text: We have a hull breach! Marines are moving to respond.

event.name: End Attack (No Attackers Aboard)
event.incoming_comms_text: Boarders have been successfully repelled.^We have casualties though. We are down to |Ship1Marines| combat ready marines.

set_ship_text.scan_desc: Intel - Refugee Marker detected.
set_ship_text.hailtext: TSN vessel, we have refugees aboard and are transporting them to a safe location.

set_ship_text.scan_desc: Intel - Cargohold shielding detected. Unregistered cargo aboard.
set_ship_text.hailtext: What we are transporting is none of your concern.

set_ship_text.scan_desc: Intel - Radiation hazard detected.
Intel - Volatile elements detected.
Intel - Hazardous chemical elements emitting from hull.
Intel - Multiple, unregistered life signs detected.
Intel - No lifesigns detected aboard vessel.
Intel - Low mass, cargo hold reading empty.
Intel - Unidentified EM readings fluctuating in lower bandwidth.
Intel - Advanced shield arrays active. Signature unknown.
Intel - Medical facilities and personnel aboard.
Intel - Denabite refinary operations active.
Intel - Metal refinary operations active.
Intel - Mineral refinary operations active.
